character.age: 5: Range of ages represented by the same actor

synopsis.native: Petite dernière d'une fratrie de 14 enfants, la petite Aline, qui vit dans un village du Québec, montre des dons précoces pour le chant. Le producteur Guy-Claude voit en elle un diamant brut. Il s'occupe de son aspect physique et de lui trouver de potentiels hits. Au fil du temps, Aline tombe amoureuse de son mentor...
synopsis.english: Quebec, the 60s. Sylvette and Anglomard welcome their 14 th child, Aline. In this modest family, music is king. When a producer discovers Aline and her golden voice, he has only one idea in mind: to make her the greatest singer in the world. Supported by her family, guided by Guy-Claude’s experience and budding love for her, Aline will create an extraordinary destiny for herself.
